PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-17202012-12-13,  DFAIT,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectConvention relating to International Exhibitions ** WITHDRAW **
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to take the actions necessary, on behalf of Canada, to WITHDRAW from the CONVENTION RELATING TO INTERNATIONAL EXHIBITIONS signed at Paris on November 22nd, 1928, and supplemented by the Protocols of May 10th, 1948, November 16th, 1966, November 30th, 1972 and the Amendment of June 24th, 1982 and the Amendment of May 31st, 1988.
AttachmentsAttachment
